d1_flags: 1. goto C8AE3B if FOURSIDE_SEWERS_OPEN is set

d1_text:
Npc1035:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG GIYGAS_DEFEATED L_C8AE72]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG FOURSIDE_SEWERS_OPEN L_C8AE3B]
ï¿½...mumble, mumble...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Why would Mr. Spoon from the Fourside museum try to call me?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I bet he just wants to brag about something...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Well,[PAUSE 15] let him try...[PAUSE 20]  I wonder what he wants to tell me?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Bah![PAUSE 20]  I dare him to try and upstage me...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Oh![PAUSE 20]  Pardon me...[PAUSE 20]  I was just talking to myself... *cough*[HALT][PLAY_SFX 114]
[HALT][END]
